2.0.0.en: Update app to SDK3 to make it compatible to Homey Pro (Early '23)

4.0.0.en: Added possibility to add PIN codes along with the user mapping, and a maintenance button for sending them to the lock

4.0.1.en: Added polling interval for fetching the door lock status in case it is out of sync

4.0.2.en: Fixed bug for z-wave modules pre 1.6
